Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 09 Dec 2018Hi, the cashback that you qualify/earn for this month will be automatically used to offset the amount due/payable for your next month's credit card statement. E.g. Assuming you have a new card16 SEP - 15 OCT: 
Amount due: $245
Cashback earned: $2.45
Amount payable: $24516 OCT - 15 NOV:
Amount due: $150
Cashback earned: $1.50
Amount payable: $150 - $2.45 = $147.55Ps I'm using a CIMB cashback credit card too0 comments1
